attributes.action: Overturn the NHS decision for my sister's life saving transplant
attributes.background: My sister has got cancer and she was told she could have a stem cell transplant which will save her life on the NHS, the NHS have now said that she cannot have this life saving treatment as they will not release the funds for it. Without this she will die. Please sign to get this decision overturned

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament cannot overturn an NHS funding decision in an individual case. If you want to call on the Government to fund the provision of a specific type of treatment by the NHS, you could start a new petition about that.
